item.description:
Ok we have 5 more weeks of Winter, we don't need a Ground Hog to tell us that we are all going stir crazy. Let's go out to Capri Seaside Italian Grille and encourage spring to arrive.

This restaurant makes great Italian food, is a relaxing atmosphere and is across the street from the Beach.

We will meet for Dinner at 7:00 pm, relax, have nice conversation with a great group of people.

So come on down to Salisbury for a great evening.

Remember, that although Spring is on its way, the weather can still be a challenge. Please check the site prior to leaving for this event if the weather is questionable. The organizers will attempt to make any cancellations at least 1 hour prior to the start time.


Hope to see you at the Beach
Janet & Donna
item.name: Winter is half over Celebration Dinner
